text: 23.34 Mat 10.23, 1 Te 2.15 Anɨb ak tek ak nɨgɨm agak. Yad bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok sek, bɨ nɨgtep gɨpal okok sek, bɨ God takaw nɨŋɨd agñeb okok sek, kɨlop agyoken nɨbop yɨl ownɨgabal agak. Apel, ogɨnap paklɨnɨgabɨm, ogɨnap mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lɨnɨgabɨm, ogɨnap Juda apnan gɨpal kal mɨgan nɨbi ak nag dɨl pakɨnɨgabɨm agak. Pen nɨbi kɨlop ogɨnap gem pɨlɨk amnɨlaknɨŋ, taun okok okok yuk yokɨnɨgabɨm agak.
